772yBQ.en:
[Charleston]
I'm a knight of Prontera.
I accidently found out about the secret of the Secret Book of the Great King and at the same time, I received a letter.
The letter said the way of getting The Secret Book of the Great King with you and Hearns and also about my personal issues.

We have lost very important treasure.
You are nothing but a stranger in this castle.
Therefore, we will arrest you for a while.
